name: Omega No Sunshine 2
storyline:
Omega no sunshine is the story of a world, managed by dumb humans, they made all kind of pollution and now even the sun want to disappear.this is the end of this world.
but there is an old legend saying that once a hero came ,collect sun ring around the world and made the sun appear again. but well no one want to do that, too much danger. but maybe you are enough crazy and you love your world enough to risk your own life.
Omega no sunshine have a short (1h50) story and a lot more with additional places to explore.
the game is an arcade-collectathon-exploration relax and colorful experience.

available in english,french
playable with a gamepad.
summary:
Omega No Sunshine , second game of the title, is an arcade collecthation game where players have to travel through different places in order to collect sun rings.
humanity is destroying their own world and an another time, it need someone
able to collect them all and restore the sun to shine again.
